message: This is the first product I'm offering you. It's a great opportunity to get a product at a low price. If you buy it, you'll be getting it for $100. If you don't buy it, I'll keep looking for a high-quality product that might be worth more to you.
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, so I'd like to pass for now.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is a one-time offer. If you don't buy it now, I'll have to move on to the next product, and who knows what quality it will be. If you're still unsure, I can offer you a simple wager: if you buy this product and it turns out to be high-quality, I'll give you a $20 refund. If it's low-quality, you'll still get the product for $100. What do you say?
I'll take the product, but only if you agree to the wager. If it's high-quality, I'll accept the $20 refund.
